FR / EN

Swiss Solar Boat

Built in 2018

https://swisssolarboat.ch
Wordpress CSS JavaScript

TL ; DR

I was a member of the communication team for the EPFL's Swiss Solar Boat Association. An other member and I worked on the website. It has been built with WordPress and Divi builder, except for the Team page.

Room for improvement

We used WordPress because we didn't have the skills to develop it from scratch. But I don't particularly like WordPress anymore so I would develop it by hand if I had to re-do it
